original_title: There Is a New World Somewhere
overview: A coming of age story about self-revelation.  Sylvia, a struggling artist in New York, is fired from her job and flees back to her Texas hometown for a friendâ€™s wedding. At the pre-wedding party, she meets an enigmatic stranger, Esteban. On the eve of the big day, he dares her to join him on a road trip through the jewel cities of the Deep South.
title: There Is a New World Somewhere
